sonance.config.shouldPlay.name: Enable Sound
sonance.config.dynamic.name: Dynamic Sounds
sonance.config.dynamic.description:
Should the sound event that is played be dependent on the item, block, or action that is currently happening?

For items and blocks, the sound event will be determined by what type of item/block it is.
sonance.config.volume.name: Sound Volume
sonance.config.pitch.name: Sound Pitch
sonance.config.pitch.description:
The pitch of the sound.

A lower pitch gives a deeper sound, whilst a higher pitch gives a more squeakier sound.
sonance.config.typing.name: Chat Typing
sonance.config.typing.description: A sound effect that is played when you type or remove characters from the chat input bar.
sonance.config.message.name: Chat Messages
sonance.config.message.description: A sound effect that is played when you receive a message in the chat.
sonance.config.mention.name: Chat Mentions
sonance.config.mention.description: A sound effect that is played when you are mentioned in a new chat message.
sonance.config.hotbarScroll.name: Hotbar Scroll
sonance.config.hotbarScroll.description: A sound effect that is played when you scroll through your hotbar or use the number keys to select a hotbar slot.
sonance.config.hotbarPick.name: Pick Block
sonance.config.hotbarPick.description: A sound effect that is played when you use the 'Pick Block' action.
sonance.config.itemCopy.name: Item Clone
sonance.config.itemCopy.description: A sound effect that is played when you clone an item in your inventory.
sonance.config.itemDelete.name: Item Delete
sonance.config.itemDelete.description: A sound effect that is played when you delete an item using the bin/garbage can in the creative inventory.
sonance.config.itemDrop.name: Item Drop
sonance.config.itemDrop.description: A sound effect that is played when you drop an item from your inventory.
sonance.config.itemDrag.name: Item Drag
sonance.config.itemDrag.description: A sound effect that is played when you drag an item across slots in your inventory.
sonance.config.inventoryOpen.name: Inventory Open
sonance.config.inventoryOpen.description: A sound effect that is played when you open a screen that has an inventory, such as an enchanting table.
sonance.config.inventoryScroll.name: Inventory Scroll
sonance.config.inventoryScroll.descripti: A sound effect that is played when you use a scrollbar in any inventory.
sonance.config.inventoryClose.name: Inventory Close
sonance.config.inventoryClose.descriptio: A sound effect that is played when you close a screen that has an inventory, such as an enchanting table.
